nodes.text: The Novor system was a 16-planet system located on the Salin Corridor in the Tharin sector. The only inhabitable planet was Novor 23. The system originally had 33 planets, but the 17 innermost planets were destroyed when the system's primary, Novor Major, expanded into its red giant phase. The remaining planets were largely unaffected, and the remains of the destroyed worlds created the Novor Asteroid Field.
